title: How come we didn't receive a caster announcer pack?

embed.description: Extremely excited that @sjokz and I have taken over the in game client announcer for the next week! 13th to 20th May. Had you played any games and heard us? What's your favourite lines? @LeagueOfLegends #LeagueOfLegends

body: All the other regions have managed to get something together, why is OCE left in the dark? If we really don't have anything despite the huge range of casting talent that we've produced, why are we unable to have Sjokz and Quickshot or even Kobe and Phreak? It really feels like we're being left out here.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Zhaoy,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=GMvWNByB,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-05-15T15:50:22.672+0000)
>
> All the other regions have managed to get something together, why is OCE left in the dark? If we really don't have anything despite the huge range of casting talent that we've produced, why are we unable to have Sjokz and Quickshot or even Kobe and Phreak? It really feels like we're being left out here.

Far out, Oce will always be left out in the world. {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
